name: rev_cons

text.english: Inductive case of rev: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; rev(a :: l) = app(rev(l),\; [a]) \]
text.italiano: Case induttivo rev: \[ \forall a \in A . \; \forall l \in L_A . \; rev(a :: l) = app(rev(l),\; [a]) \]

coq:
Lemma rev_cons: forall a : A , forall l : list , rev (a :: l) = app (rev l) [a].
Proof.
Admitted.
